programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud/Rainbow Comet Rush - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.desc: Pups in a Jam / Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - Its the annual Jamboree Jamfest, but all of the fruit is carried off by ants! It's up to the pups to lure the ants to safety. // Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing / Pups Save a Space Toy - Fertilizer causes Yumis crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce! // The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Als field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Trojan Sea Horse - Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale thats trapped under the ice.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Parroting Pups / Merpups Save the Turbots - Rocky loses his voice and cant bark out his puppack tools, but Matea the parrot has no problem doing it for him. // The Magical Mer Moon means the Merpups are back, only this time theyre helping the PAW Patrol on a rescue.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate..

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321

programme.desc: The Construction Contest - To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, it'll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubbles dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Gobble Gobble Guppies! - Fall is here! Molly and Gil can't wait to pick pumpkins, but when they lead everyone to the pumpkin patch, the pumpkins are gone! Their turkey friend Giblet leads them on a hunt to find the culprits: the pumpkin patch pirates!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure itout.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae - Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate..

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Powerless - With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: LIVE:UFC 292: Sterling vs O'Malley
programme.desc: Main Event - Fresh from a major victory over Henry Cejudo, Aljamain Sterling puts his UFC bantamweight title on the line on August 19 against Sugar Sean OMalley in a quest to not just keep his crown but cement his place as the best bantamweight to ever wear UFC gold. In the co-main event of UFC 292, which takes place at TD Garden in Boston, Chinese star Zhang Weili defends her UFC strawweight championship against Brazilian battler Amanda Lemo

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2323
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Monster Energy British Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - With more than 60 years of history Silverstone has become one of the most prestigious venues dedicated to motorsport. Completely revamped in recent years, a multimillion pound investment saw the completion in 2010 of a first phase of works to greatly improve the venue, making it one of the fastest tracks on the MotoGP calendar and earning high praise from the World Championship riders who enjoyed the new layout. The Silverstone Wing, a state-of-the-art, multi-million pound complex, became a new landmark at the circuit from 2011, thus adding to already breathtaking facilities at Silverstone

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2323
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Luque vs Dos Anjos
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to UFC APEX in Las Vegas this weekend with a clash of top ranked welterweight contenders as No. 10 Vicente Luque welcomes former UFC lightweight champion Rafael Dos Anjos into a rankings challenge. In the co-main event at featherweight, fan favorite Hall of Famer Cub Swanson squares off against surging KO artist Hakeem Dawodu. UFC FIGHT NIGHT: LUQUE vs DOS ANJOS will air live in Asia on Sunday, August 13. The main card begins at 7am and the prelims start at 4am. Below are the event materials to assist in your coverage.
